import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List team members (paged)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/teams/{teamId}/paged-members"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves team members with pagination. Use this when teams are large and you need consistent paging for UI or exports.

**Prerequisites**
1. **teamId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/teams](/docs/api/teams/list-teams) or [GET /api/v1.0/teams/all](/docs/api/teams/list-all-teams) to list teams and extract `Items[].TeamId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Choose a teamId.
2. [GET /api/v1.0/teams/\{teamId\}/paged-members](/docs/api/teams/list-paged-team-members) with `$p` and `$s`.
3. Page through results to retrieve all members.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `teamId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"teamId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"$p","in":"query","description":"Page index (0-based)","schema":{"type":"integer","default":0}},{"name":"$s","in":"query","description":"Page size","schema":{"type":"integer","default":25}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
